name: Washington National Airport - DCA - 4K Airport Tour
description:
Thanks for joining me on this airport tour of Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, now in 4K! Today's tour covers one of the three airports serving the country's capital, and it's the oldest, closest, and potentially most interesting of the three. 

As a hub for American Eagle, DCA provides service to dozens of destinations around the country. Security regulations limiting the distance planes to and from DCA can travel, along with the frequent, shuttle-style service provided to the airport give it a unique destination profile.

I try to cover what I can in a short video, but I'm sure there are things I've missed; please leave a comment below if you have questions about the tour or navigating the airport, and I'll do my best to answer them! Or, share your own thoughts and experiences about DCA!

Finally, let me know where you'd like to see next! Now that I've been vaccinated, I'm able to travel with more confidence. Stay tuned for new flight and airport videos every two weeks!

The contents of this video and its production are not endorsed by any entity portrayed therein, and none of the entities provided any input or compensation in the production of this video.

If you'd like to speak with me directly about the contents of this video or my channel, you can reach me at milesbyfoot at gmail.com.

Thumbnail by my artist wife, Beth!

IG: bethmclain.art
Twitter: Marshmallowbat

00:00 - Intro
01:00 - American Airlines Terminals
02:20 - JetBlue Terminal
02:35 - Alaska, United, Delta Terminal
03:05 - Air Canada, Frontier, Southwest Terminal
03:30 - DCA's History
03:55 - New Checkpoints
04:10 - Metro Connection
05:10 - Conclusion

Thanks again for watching, and keep moving forward!

#airport #airporttour #dca #reagan #washingtondc #aviation #travel
